about.title: About David Montoya Giraldo
about.profile_text: I am currently in the sixth semester of my academic training. I am interested in doing an internship in companies focused on remodeling, renovation, design, and construction management to develop my skills and gain practical experience. I have knowledge in architectural details, proficiency in architecture-focused software, and rendering engines. I possess skills in digital representation, mastery of Revit, AutoCAD, applied knowledge of rendering engines, and teamwork, and I am continuously seeking opportunities to improve and learn. My professional interests include the constant search for knowledge through books, magazines, and social media. I am also interested in new technologies and eager to contribute and learn in a professional setting.
about.skill_6: Continuous search for knowledge and learning
